channel.title: Asteria-Pkz
channel.description:
Here's our website! http://www.asteriapkz.smfnew.com/index.php New Updates since last bump. We have added Fixed the ips for the starter sets, you only can get 2 from each ip adress, you get: 75m, 50 of each pot, and 2.5k barrages. Fixed Donator points. Fixed the pictures on the forums. Fixed npc's/autocast Fixed some t2 errors Mining has been %75 added. Added perfect switching, instead of the clicks being instant which makes them dragable, we have a bit of a delay for the runescape switch feeling. New f keys.
Stuff we have done, but not relesed. Adding new mystic models New client, has more stuff in it.
Stuff we have planned to fix. Bandos tassets fix. Hp bug Vote4pkp Donate4items Donator Symbols We have a few other bugs, but do not want them to be in the public, could ruin the community.
The website contains all the information about the server! We plan to use all the money from our donations to benefit the server and not us in anyways.
AsteriaPkz a server what is completely Economy and is based around Player Killing. The Wilderness is ALWAYS active at multiple locations (Edge, Easts, Wests, Mage bank, 44 Portals) and other Mysterious locations.
Pictures There's much more like corp ect, i'm just too lazy to upload more, that's like 11 pictures, 10 mins LOL. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/sljgpj.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2mxmvxv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/scsu53.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/70es04.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1zb4h7o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2yukakp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2wrq5ar.png[/img] NOTE: SHOP "1" CONTAINS PVP WEAPONS AND SHIELDS, SHOP "2" HAS PVP ARMOUR LIKE VESTA, TORVA ETC.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/14myiie.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/w8wec0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ms4i11.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/vcq4u8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/rcsz7k.png[/img] What our server features All working Godswords. New rs combat. Korasi (Working animation) Great switching. Perfected dice, dice all your goods! Donator ranks with certain doings. Pvp shop, for the best of pkers. Working barrows armour. Need staff members Also.
Staff list
Owners: 1. Dan 2. Mc Lovin
Administrators: 1. -
Moderators: 1. - 2. - 3. -

item.title: Asteria-Pkz
item.dc:creator: @r0fl_dr0pped r0fl dr0pped
item.description:
@r0fl_dr0pped wrote:

Here’s our website!
http://www.asteriapkz.smfnew.com/index.php
New Updates since last bump.
We have added
Fixed the ips for the starter sets, you only can get 2 from each ip adress, you get: 75m, 50 of each pot, and 2.5k barrages.
Fixed Donator points.
Fixed the pictures on the forums.
Fixed npc’s/autocast
Fixed some t2 errors
Mining has been %75 added.
Added perfect switching, instead of the clicks being instant which makes them dragable, we have a bit of a delay for the runescape switch feeling.
New f keys.

Stuff we have done, but not relesed.
Adding new mystic models
New client, has more stuff in it.

Stuff we have planned to fix.
Bandos tassets fix.
Hp bug
Vote4pkp
Donate4items
Donator Symbols
We have a few other bugs, but do not want them to be in the public, could ruin the community.

The website contains all the information about the server!
We plan to use all the money from our donations to benefit the server and not us in anyways.

AsteriaPkz a server what is completely Economy and is based around Player Killing. The Wilderness is ALWAYS active at multiple locations (Edge, Easts, Wests, Mage bank, 44 Portals) and other Mysterious locations.

Pictures
There’s much more like corp ect, i’m just too lazy to upload more, that’s like 11 pictures, 10 mins LOL.
